vistra.app.control.state

Class AnimationStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • vistra.app.control.state.AnimationStateHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.util.EventListener, IAnimation, IControlContext

    public final class AnimationStateHandler
extends java.util.Observable
implements IAnimation
    An animation handler: handles the animated iteration over a traversal-object.

    As a part of the graphic user interface control, this state handler is an is a focus listener (delay setting) and an action listener (buttons), too.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    ParameterStateHandler, SbsStateHandler
